About 161 Auburn St Unit 161

Built in 2015, this 1763 sq ft contemporary townhouse is only minutes away from the heart of Central Square, yet it carries a tranquil suburban feeling. Its large windows throughout let in a wealth of natural sunlight and fantastic Boston skyline views, while its heated garage and fenced yard are there to provide a sense of privacy and seclusion. The home features a modern open living space including a stunning chef’s kitchen on the first floor, a spacious bedroom with walk-in closet and exclusive balcony access on the second, and a sun-soaked primary suite with en-suite bath and an amazing balcony view on the third. The finished basement with full bath offers additional versatile space for work or play. Automated smart home functionalities, 2-zone central heating/cooling, and easy indoor access from the garage all make living here intuitive and comfortable. The modern design and the sweet blend of city living with tranquility make this an offering that you don’t want to miss.
